description: Try our easy to follow Lemon, Lime & Ginger Chicken Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lemon, Lime & Ginger Chicken Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 8 leaves mint leaves, sliced in halves (large)

recipeInstructions.text: Combine all marinade ingredients together and cover the chicken. Marinate for approx. 2 hours, then slice the chicken into very thin strips and set aside.
Lay out the Mountain BreadTM and on one edge spread some bean shoots, then top with carrot, spring onion, two mint halves and finish with 2 chicken strips.
Brush the edges with a little water and tightly roll, ensuring the ends are folded as well.
Heat the oil in a pan and slowly shallow fry on a low to medium heat until chicken is cooked. Turn frequently to ensure the bread doesnâ€™t burn.
Serve with sweet chilli dipping sauce.
